name: Compliance Obligations
definition: Set of requirements organizations must meet for GDPR compliance

name: Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA)
definition: Process to assess processing operations likely to result in high risk to rights and freedoms

name: Data Protection by Design and Default
definition: Implementing data protection from project initiation and default implementation of safeguards

name: Records of Processing (RoPA)
definition: Documentation of processing activities conducted by controller and processor

name: Standard Data Protection Clauses (SCCs)
definition: Standard contractual clauses for data transfers outside EU/EEA

name: Binding Corporate Rules (BCRs)
definition: Internal policies for intra-group data transfers with adequacy commitments

name: Data Processing Agreement (DPA)
definition: Agreement between controller and processor outlining processing terms and obligations

name: Consent Management
definition: Obtaining, managing, recording and evidencing explicit consent from data subjects

name: Privacy Notice/Notification
definition: Transparent communication of data processing practices, purposes and rights to data subjects

name: Breach Notification
definition: Required notification to supervisory authorities and affected individuals upon personal data breach

name: Audit and Compliance Monitoring
definition: Regular assessment of processing activities against GDPR requirements and controls effectiveness

name: Data Protection Officer (DPO)
definition: Designated person responsible for monitoring GDPR compliance and data subject requests

name: Staff Training and Awareness
definition: Educational programs ensuring employees understand data protection obligations and risks

name: Security Measures
definition: Technical and organizational measures protecting personal data confidentiality, integrity and availability

name: Impact Assessment
definition: Evaluation of processing activities' potential impact on data subjects and compliance risks
